paper_abstract: We present improved parameterized algorithms for the FEEDBACK VERTEX SET problem on both unweighted and weighted graphs. Both algorithms run in time O(5(k)kn(2)). The algorithms construct a feedback vertex set of size at most k (in the weighted case this set is of minimum weight among the feedback vertex sets of size at most k) in a given graph G of n vertices, or report that no such feedback vertex set exists in G. (C) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Improved algorithms for feedback vertex set problems
